Package com.dextra.challenge.makemagic.controller

Class CharacterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dextra.challenge.makemagic.controller.CharacterController
  • @Validated
@RestController
@RequestMapping(path="/api/characters")
public class CharacterController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for Character REST endpoints.

    This class handle the CRUD operations for Characters from Harry Potter Universe, via HTTP actions.

    *@author oruam

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCharacters

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<CharacterResponseDTO>> getAllCharacters​(@Pattern(regexp="^\\w{8}-\\w{4}-\\w{4}-\\w{4}-\\w{12}$",message="Invalid House ID") @RequestParam(required=false,name="house")
                                                                                                      @Pattern(regexp="^\\w{8}-\\w{4}-\\w{4}-\\w{4}-\\w{12}$",message="Invalid House ID") java.lang.String house)
        Get all the characters saved on the database or return all the characters based on the house id. Returns one of the following status code: 200: sucessfully return a list of Characters.
        Parameters:
        house - past by request param to filter the results by this parameter.
        Returns:
        a list of Characters.

      • getById

        @GetMapping(path="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CharacterResponseDTO> getById​(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                             java.lang.Long id)
        Get a character based on the id. Returns one of the following status code: 200: sucessfully a Character. 404: unable to return a character, because didn't found any register with this id.
        Parameters:
        id - past by path variable.
        Returns:
        a single character when sucessful.

      • createCharacter

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CharacterResponseDTO> createCharacter​(@RequestBody @Valid
                                                                                     @Valid CharacterRequestDTO dto)
        Create a new character object, given the data provided. Returns one of the following status code: 201: sucessfully created a new character. 404: unable to create character, because didn't found a house by house id.
        Parameters:
        dto - a JSON representation of a character object.
        Returns:
        the newly created character object.

      • updateCharacter

        @PutMapping(path="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CharacterResponseDTO> updateCharacter​(@RequestBody @Valid
                                                                                     @Valid CharacterRequestDTO dto,
                                                                                     @PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                                     java.lang.Long id)
        Replace the informations about one character in the database. Returns one of the following status code: 200: sucessfully update the informations of the character. 404: unable to update the character, because didn't found any register with this id.
        Parameters:
        dto - a JSON representation of a character object.
        id - past by path variable.
        Returns:
        an updated character object.

      • deleteCharacter

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteCharacter​(@PathVariable(name="id")
                                                                               java.lang.Long id)
        Remove a character from the database. Returns one of the following status code: 204: sucessfully remove the informations of the character. 404: unable to update the character, because didn't found any register with this id.
        Parameters:
        id - past by path variable.
        Returns:
        an empty response when successful.
